text:
- [Narrator] In an ever-changing
and uncertain world,
AWS has stayed consistent

by building resilient, global
infrastructure designed
to meet your evolving needs.
(bright music)

AWS's infrastructure and
network is architected

to meet the highest levels
of security, compliance,
and data protection.
From day one, AWS knew the importance

of supporting high-transaction,
low-latency applications
that can replicate data

between geographically
dispersed data centers.
That's why each AWS region is built

with multiple availability
zones that are separated
from one another by a meaningful distance,
and each have their own redundant power,
networking, and connectivity.

AWS's expanding global
infrastructure portfolio
is here to meet your needs.
Choose the infrastructure type you need
to build highly available applications,

and get performance that
exceeds expectations.
Pick any region around the globe
for your most demanding workloads.

You can use CloudFront to
quickly deliver your content,

AWS Local Zones for
low-latency applications,
AWS Wavelength to deliver
powerful 5G applications on demand,

and bring the cloud to your
data center with AWS Outposts.

The AWS cloud is built for
your needs today, tomorrow,
and the future.
